items.text: skips down the track, but the bowler pulls his length back a tad. Manages to tap it down to long-on comfortably in the end
items.shortText: Chase to Liton Das, 1 run

items.text: taken at point floated outside off invitingly, and Tamim falls prey to temptation, tries to flay it. the ball spins away and takes his outside edge for a simple catch to Bishoo
items.shortText: Chase to Tamim Iqbal, OUT

dismissal.text: Tamim Iqbal c Bishoo b Chase 12 (24b 0x4 0x6) SR: 50.00

items.preText: So West Indies have their breakthrough, though they will be thinking it could have been two down. And after his reprieve, Liton has already hit two fours. He'll be joined by Imrul Kayes. And here's Oshane Thomas with the ball. He's quick, very quick.
items.text: bouncer first up, at 141.7 clicks. Liton is forced to duck under it
items.shortText: Thomas to Liton Das, no run

items.text: length ball on the stumps, squirted to point with soft hands for a quick single
items.shortText: Thomas to Liton Das, 1 run

items.text: rears up from back of a length on off, and takes the outside edge of the bat to go past second slip and to the boundary
items.shortText: Thomas to Imrul Kayes, FOUR runs

items.text: cleaned him up beaten by pace. Round the wicket, full fast and straight, angling into the batsman. He went for a big drive, but was nowhere close to the ball, which cannoned into the stumps through the big gap left. The feet were stuck as if cemented, but that's what searing pace can do.
items.shortText: Thomas to Imrul Kayes, OUT

items.preText: Mushfiqur Rahim comes in. Slip and leg slip
items.text: length ball outside off, defended confidently to point
items.shortText: Thomas to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: no ball, free hit coming up it was fuller on the pads and he tried to tuck it away, but Oshane has over stepped
items.shortText: Thomas to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 no ball

items.text: good ball for free hit, short ball on target, Rahim stepped away to try and carve it, but missed it altogether
items.shortText: Thomas to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.preText: Tasmeem: "For the past few years, the umpires are neglecting the front foot no ball a lot. How many times we have seen a wicket of a no ball in the past few years? Quite a few, I reckon." - It's difficult to look down and look up immediately to be fair to umpires. Maybe the solution is to make front-foot no-balls the responsibility of the third umpire?
items.text: back of a length on off, steered to point, where the fielder makes a good save, diving to his left
items.shortText: Paul to Liton Das, no run

items.text: ripper of a short ball rears up from a length and hits Liton on the glove in front of his throat. The variable bounce has made life difficult for batsmen
items.postText: Liton getting some attention on his hand after that hit
items.shortText: Paul to Liton Das, no run

items.text: back of a length on the stumps again, this one doesn't rise as much. Squired to point
items.shortText: Paul to Liton Das, no run

items.preText: khan: "BD should be careful, chasing low target is always tricky, they need to do the basic things right, runs will follow. just back your own game."
items.text: that one took off dug it in short, it's only 127 clicks but it's gone well over head height and it's called a wide
items.shortText: Paul to Liton Das, 1 wide

items.text: back of a length on off, but he rides the bounce nicely to pull it in front of square
items.shortText: Paul to Liton Das, 1 run

items.preText: Monjur Hassan: "Who's the faster, Roach or Thomas?" - Thomas
items.text: short ball again, angling into the batsman. Defended from the back foot to drop the ball in front of him
items.shortText: Paul to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: good length outside off, steered to third man
items.postText: Time for Hemant to take over again
items.shortText: Paul to Mushfiqur Rahim, 2 runs

items.preText: Thanks, Saurabh. The West Indies seamers have brought the game alive with pace and bounce. Here is Thomas with more of that.
items.text: short of length outside off, defended back towards the bowler off the back foot
items.shortText: Thomas to Liton Das, no run

items.text: 147.1 kph this one, short of length outside off, and beating the batsman with pace who was looking to push at it
items.shortText: Thomas to Liton Das, no run

items.text: length outside off, pushes it towards cover-point
items.shortText: Thomas to Liton Das, no run

items.text: 144.3 kphs, short of length but on the pads this time, tucked away towards fine leg
items.shortText: Thomas to Liton Das, 1 run

items.text: short of length but a bit to wide, Mushfiqur sways away
items.shortText: Thomas to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: length, pitching way outside off and moving further away, left alone
items.shortText: Thomas to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 wide

items.text: on the pads once again, 141.9 kphs this one, flicked towards fine leg
items.postText: Nazim Ali: "Please bring the speed gun out on Oshane Thomas" -- He's bowling in excess of 145 kph
items.shortText: Thomas to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: back of length outside off, stands tall and steers it towards third man
items.shortText: Paul to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: length, just outside off, Liton was playing inside the line, looking to run it down, gets beaten
items.shortText: Paul to Liton Das, no run
